data.title: Oregon Medical Alert
meta_keywords: Oregon Medical Alert Systems For Seniors
data.meta_description: Medical Systems help elderly in Oregon with 24/7 medical alert motioning service for the entire state of OR.
data.text:
How To Get A Medical Alert System In Oregon

From Adams to Yoncalla, we protect thousands of seniors in The Emerald State of Oregon and nationwide. Protect yourself or an elderly loved one with a medical alert system and get peace of mind for the whole family! Systems start at under $1 a day with our award-winning customer service and monitoring. Start by finding your city below, or call us at 1-855-272-1010.

Medical Care Alert Coverage In Oregon

Coverage By City In Oregon

We cover the entire State of Oregon with our Medical Alert Monitoring Service - please call 1-855-272-1010 if you don't see your city or town listed below.

When you press your medical alert button you'll be connected to our Emergency Response Center. You'll speak with an EMT/EMD-Certified operator who knows WHO and WHERE you are. Depending on what kind of help you need, we'll contact family, neighbors, or alert life safety EMS to your location. All responders are local, getting you help fast.

What resources are available for elderly seniors in Oregon?

While not an exhaustive list, below are some agencies in Oregon that can help you get started.

Oregon State Area Agencies on Aging: https://www.oregon.gov

Oregon State Senior Services Help Line: 800-282-8096 or 503-945-5921

Oregon State Senior Services Email Contact: spd.web@state.or.us

Oregon Elder Abuse Hotline: 800-232-3020

Free Fall Prevention Guide for Oregon Seniors

How much does a medical alert system in Oregon cost?

The medical alert button cost is included in the price of your medical alert system - prices range from $27.45 to $45.79 a month for service. Our "HOME" annual plan pricing is just $27.45 a month. If you need an extra medical alert button, they are available for a small cost of $29.95 - $60.00 depending on the system type, click here to see the HOME Medical Alert Button. For around $1 a day, you or your loved one will be protected and able to continue living independently at home.

Can the button go with me if I move or am on vacation?

You can easily take our "HOME" or "HOME & YARD" systems with you on vacation, or if you are a SnowBird. It is very easy to unplug and re-install. Simply notify Medical Care Alert Customer Service at 877-913-3680 of your current location. Information can be changed anytime and as many times as needed at no charge.

Our "HOME & AWAY" systems with GPS can be taken anywhere in the USA. You will be protected anywhere you have coverage with the AT&T or Verizon Cellular Wireless network.
